title: Vivendi Cup
text: The Vivendi Cup was a one-off <a href="European%20Tour">European Tour</a> <a href="golf">golf</a> tournament which was played from 23 to 26 September 2010 at <a href="Golf%20de%20Joyenval">Golf de Joyenval</a>, <a href="Chambourcy">Chambourcy</a> near <a href="Paris">Paris</a> in <a href="France">France</a>. The Vivendi Cup was a 72-hole stroke play tournament, with the first 36 holes played as a team <a href="Pro-Am">Pro-Am</a> event involving one professional and one amateur over the Retz and Marly Courses at Golf de Joyenval, both designed by <a href="Robert%20Trent%20Jones">Robert Trent Jones</a>. The sponsors for the event were <a href="Canal%2B">Canal+</a> and <a href="Vivendi">Vivendi</a>.
